West Ham boss David Moyes has told Lyon forward Moussa Dembele what goes around comes around.

articles.title: Chelsea: Romelu Lukaku has declined in all departments since his Sky Italia interview, stats show - Daily Mail
articles.description: Romelu Lukaku's £98m move to Chelsea has turned out to be nothing short of a disaster, and on Wednesday night his stuttering Stamford Bridge career plummeted to a new low.
